sections.heading: PAYMENT OF RENTArt. 2703. When and where rent is dueIn the absence of a contrary agreement, usage, or custom:(1) The rent is due at the beginning of the term
sections.text: If the rent is payable by intervals shorter than the term, the rent is due at the beginning of each interval.(2) The rent is payable at the a
